section.title: Defining new disks during provisioning
section.para: This parameter value and its options allow you to add disks as part of the provisioning web service.
Usable in these Methods: EVMProvisionRequestEx, VmProvisionRequest.
section.programlisting:
diskscsi##=<controller_#>:<controller_position_#>:<size_in_mb> Optional: diskscsi##.datastore=<datastore name> diskscsi##.filename =<filename>
diskscsi##.connectable.allowGuestControl = <true/false> Â Default: false diskscsi##.connectable.startConnected = <true/false> Â Default: true diskscsi##.connectable.connected = <true/false> Â Default: true
diskscsi##.backing.diskmode = <> Â Default: persistent (diskMode types: persistent, independent_persistent, independent_nonpersistent, nonpersistent) diskscsi##.backing.split = <true/false> Â Default: false diskscsi##.backing.thinProvisioned = <true/false> Â Default: false diskscsi##.backing.writeThrough = <true/false> Â Default: false
